Articles.Content: So I was sailing a boat in KSP when I went to the KSC.  Then I switch back to it, and suddenly the boat is 50 m in the air.  Can someone explain to me how to avoid this from happening and if there are any realistic water mods that prevent this?

Well, most mods don't actually fix blatant bugs in the stock code -- and this is a blatant bug in the stock code. I don't know that anyone has a good idea why it happens, so I kinda doubt anyone has a workaround.
